chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
Damage to the housing. I ordered the phone in excellent condition, which does not match their descriptions, see attached pictures. The damage to the housing is clearly visible and it's not scratches but actual dents on the housing. I therefore request a refund.

Thank you for your help,

Hello Zübeyde, You will find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby return location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return: 1. Check out instructions on how to return an item here: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any protective coverings or films. 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below. How to package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, and your product should be placed inside so it can't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a backup label inside in case the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before sending it. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transport. Your return is now ready for pickup! We'll let you know as soon as it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile,

the customer is not satisfied with the condition of the device. Would therefore like a refund. We’re continuing with the return.

Best Regards,
Derya from the Back Care Team
